thread.title: Rookie Vegas Golden Knights Hit the Jackpot

author: Jason Gay
title: Rookie Vegas Golden Knights Hit the Jackpot
text:
Allow me to join the most popular confession in sports: I did NOT see this Vegas hockey thing coming.
Not like this. Not at all.
I mean, I was there, barely a year ago, at Vegas Golden Knights headquarters, in Summerlin, Nev., a shortish drive from the Strip, where I met with some of the NHL expansion teamâ€™s marketing people. The office... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
